pkgmetadata.longdescription: Wrapper for Alpha Vantage API // Download data from the Alpha Vantage API (https://www.alphavantage.co/). Alpha Vantage is a RESTful API which provides various financial data, including stock prices and technical indicators. There is documentation for the underlying API available here: https://www.alphavantage.co/documentation/. To get access to this API, the user needs to first claim an API key: https://www.alphavantage.co/support/.
